snippet: Jon Lester allowed one earned run and struck out nine in besting Max Scherzer, who lost for the first time since July 13.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Boston Red Sox beat Detroit Tigers, 2-1; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jon Lester allowed one earned run and struck out nine in besting Max Scherzer, who lost for the first time since July 13.

headline.main: Red Sox Foil Scherzer’s Bid For 20-1 Start
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Foil Scherzer’s Bid For 20-1 Start
